contents.text: Trackers Excursions is one of the leading Companies in Cyprus with the requisite expertise and equipment including a fleet of 4 x 4 Land Rover Defender and Mini buses for hosting a wide range of events.
We organize team building activities and unique corporate outings for groups and employees of the company, improving employee wellness, performance and Morale.

Our Staff has a wide knowledge in this area of operation and is always ready to plan and adapt an itinerary to suit your interest. We have been creating unique special interest tours for institutions sponsoring programs in archaeology, nature, sports as well as team building groups.
If you are looking for lots of fun and adventure, you like to build relationships within your teams, call us today to discuss a tailored one or two days excursion.
5 key benefits of your team building excursion you should consider:
Identifies a team’s strengths and weaknesses
Enhance the ability to problem solving
We are one of the few companies in Cyprus that provide team building activities in combination with an excursion.
“Eternal, enchanting, stunning, endless…” These are some of the words used to describe the natural beauty of Cyprus.”

Here is a combination Land and Sea tour featuring a day full of adventure and sightseeing across the Eastern Cyprus spectacular coastal frontier. A jeep safari based voyage that takes in the Cape Greko landmarks while challenging you to solve tasks and encounters.

Here is a combination Land and Sea tour featuring a day full of adventure and sightseeing across the Eastern Cyprus spectacular coastal frontier. A jeep safari based voyage that takes in the Cape Greko landmarks while challenging you to solve tasks and encounters.

Our Best Group excursion ever and an exclusive one to Trackers Jeep Safari!

A very unique incentive tour like no other on the Island, guaranteed to bring out the best communication and team work in your employees. Your group will be divided into teams where they will compete against each other for the maximum score by completing adventure activities and a questionnaire....

Our best excursion ever and an exclusive one to Trackers Excursions! This excursion includes everything including an off road experience with loads of activities to keep everybody happy. You can get your hands a little dirty by gathering eggs and milking the goats. We then sit down to a delicious breakfast consisting of everything the farm produces, like fresh eggs, haloumi cheese, organic grown vegetables and locally baked fresh bread...

Here is a combination Land and Sea tour featuring a day full of adventure and sightseeing across the Eastern Cyprus spectacular coastal frontier. A jeep safari based voyage that takes in the Cape Greko landmarks while challenging you to solve tasks and encounters.
